what_you_do: Arianna Huffington is the founder and CEO of Thrive Global, a behavior change technology company with the mission of improving health outcomes and productivity.
social_proof: Arianna Huffington has been named to Time Magazine's list of the world's 100 most influential people and the Forbes Most Powerful Women list. She is the founder of The Huffington Post and the author of 15 books, including international bestsellers Thrive and The Sleep Revolution.
